channel.title: Need help with an annoying problem dealing with my run.bat
channel.description:
ok so here's the prob, this happens [b][u]everytime[/u][/b] i run the server! [code]Starting DaWapeScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)[/code] well anyway, when someone logs in this happens. [code]Starting DaWapeScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29) ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49510 Client type: low memory version UserId: 88227363 str3ngthz is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfrom\str3ngthz.txt (The system cannot fi nd the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:177) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:102) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(FileWriter.java:61) at client.appendConnected(client.java:9803) at client.run(client.java:10075) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49511 Client type: low memory version UserId: 44118130 str3ngthz is signing onto server. [client-2-str3ngthz]: str3ngthz is already online.[/code]
Notice that last line...Str3ngthz is already online... ya so i can't log onto my server that I've been working on for a long time now. Because i have no idea on how to fix it :(. Could someone please help???

item.title: Need help with an annoying problem dealing with my run.bat
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

send my your auto spawn and shops cfg via PM and i can fix it up

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with an annoying problem dealing with my run.bat

item.title: Need help with an annoying problem dealing with my run.bat
item.dc:creator: @Str3ngthzzz Str3ngthzzz
item.description:
@Str3ngthzzz wrote:

[quote=“God Tricky, post:7, topic:108540”]Ok, in the coding adding a item to shop or spawnign a npc, YOU DID SPACES INSTED OF TABS
Press the tab key after it, kk

Eg Spawn=53 X cord and so on[/quote]

ok thats probably what it is because it stopped working after i saved and closed out of both my autospawn and shops.cfg…

ill see if i can find where i messed up.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with an annoying problem dealing with my run.bat
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

[quote=“Str3ngthzzz, post:5, topic:108540”][quote author=Carazon link=topic=155362.msg1461131#msg1461131 date=1181483228]
Are you a useing a Client?
[/quote]nope, just moparscape[/quote]

it looks you you have used coding from a wrong server type and mixed them, i suggest you go back to your backups and make sure that it was for the server you are running

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with an annoying problem dealing with my run.bat
item.dc:creator: @Str3ngthzzz Str3ngthzzz
item.description:
@Str3ngthzzz wrote:

ok so here’s the prob, this happens everytime i run the server!

Starting DaWapeScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)
well anyway, when someone logs in this happens.

Starting DaWapeScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29) ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49510 Client type: low memory version UserId: 88227363 str3ngthz is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfrom\str3ngthz.txt (The system cannot fi nd the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:177) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:102) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(FileWriter.java:61) at client.appendConnected(client.java:9803) at client.run(client.java:10075) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49511 Client type: low memory version UserId: 44118130 str3ngthz is signing onto server. [client-2-str3ngthz]: str3ngthz is already online.

Notice that last line…Str3ngthz is already online… ya so i can’t log onto my server that I’ve been working on for a long time now.
Because i have no idea on how to fix it :(. Could someone please help???
